data.title: Hardcore Henry
data.meta_description: Find books, music, movies and more in the Kingston Frontenac Public Library's online catalogue .
data.text:
This is a superbly weird first person shooting film that is definitely not what your father watched. The whole film is viewed through the eyes of Henry, a part cybernetic part human super warrior and is non stop action, including dozens of gruesome killings.

It is so near ridiculous that it is charming in its own way and a blast to watch if you are into this type of film.

Think of it as John Wicks but from the eyes of Wick.

Don't take it seriously, just laugh and cringe.
